EmailTemplate.subject: Here's the download you requested
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Hello, {{Lead.First Name}},
Your use case “Public-private cloud for large enterprises” is ready to download.
Discover successful implementations of public-private hybrid clouds. Then let Nokia show you how to unite private and public cloud approaches into a manageable and coherent whole. Download use case <[[https://networks.nokia.com/use-case/large-webscale/public-private-hybrid-cloud]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Terms of Use <[[{{my.Terms}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
